Reviews.Title: “Hotel of Choice in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: Shadow_Ray
Reviews.Content: The hotel is situated close to Taksim square, 2 minutes walk only. the hotel is clean and the staff is friendly, well informed and helpful with tours and places to visit. If you want to know how to go to any place in Istanbul, just ask Hasan. If you are going to stay in Taksim area, Faros is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice in the modern center”
Reviews.Author: Attila A
Reviews.Content: We have spent a full week in this hotel (mixed between business and tourism). Its just 2 minutes off Taksim square, ideal to be close and quiet at the same time. The rooms are perhaps smaller than in other cities, in hotels of same kind, but they are nicely designed ("loft feeling"), impeccably clean with very comfortable beds and nice marble bathroom. Breakfast is excellent in quality and quantity for Turkish or continental tastes alike. The staff is friendly and helpful (gave me travel card for my stay for example) and also tempting to resolve impossible problems like : everybody can connect to internet (including my smartphone) except my laptop.. Given the way my room was set up, I think it is also possible to share two rooms with one main entrance. Isolation of noise (outside and rooms around ) is perfect

Reviews.Title: “Diamond in the rough!”
Reviews.Author: Farah M
Reviews.Content: Istanbul was an incredible experience of its own, let alone Faros Hotel's newest branch next to the center of the city in Taksim square. It was a very clean, design boutique hotel and the pictures you see on booking.com don't give it credit it deserves.The staff was extremely friendly, very helpful with tours and lead us to the best restaurants in town! This goes out to Hasan, Emre, Umit & Ahmet!!! Thumbs up guys!!! Hope to see you again on our next trip to Istanbul! xxx

Reviews.Title: “Spot on service, great people,extremely helpful, and a minute walk from Taksim and Istiklal street.”
Reviews.Author: Pascale_Y
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a clean moderate hotel around Taksim square, Faros is the best, their service is amazing, I was shocked how nice they are.. And how clean the rooms were. I can honestly say that the only people I saw smiling and caring were at Faros hotel. They explained to us several times best locations to visit and how to reach sultan ahmet and grand bazar in 15mns thru the tram.. They even reserved for us the best crusing trip around bosphore while the cruise organizers picked us from the hotel and drove us back to the hotel. Talking about transportation, the hotel is 20mns drive from the airport, easy to find on Taksim, and 10 minutes away from. Sultan Ahmet and the old cities. Always ask for Hassan and Eren for help they are fluent in english unlike the majority of the locals we talked to, they wouldn't mind giving you any advice about istanbul locations and best spots. They made our latest trip amazing indeed. We are even planning a second stay early june and we'll be booking at Faros. So if you are looking for nightlife, book faros to enjoy istiklal's street pubs n take the trams 100 meters away faros hotel to the old city during the day.. Highly recommended hotel..

Reviews.Title: “Our hotel experience”
Reviews.Author: Henri K
Reviews.Content: We had a very warm welcoming and were immediately served and well informed of all we needed to know. The room we had on the 4th floor was equiped to our full satisfaction, although there was only little room to store away our clothes. The beds are of high comfort which we really appreciated, and the nights were surprisingly quiet! The only negative: slamming doors! The breakfast buffet was ample and the service friendly and efficient. The interior decoration is done with creativity and pleases the modern person. The location is very practical to reach different areas of the city. The surrounding needs a little more development, but its getting there... Overall we were most pleased and happy to stay in this small and personal hotel where you feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Surprising experience”
Reviews.Author: Esther R
Reviews.Content: I have been at Faros Hotel Taksim for 5 nights. Although I am used to travel, I think that it is the first time that I feel like at home in a hotel. It is clean and nice and what is more important, all people in reception makes you feel that they really care about you. Although all the personal has been very nice I want to mention specially Hasan how was there every morning with his nice smile making your start of the day much more attractive. I am sure that I will be back to Istambul and that I will again be at the Faros Hotel Taksim.

Reviews.Title: “Faros Hotel in Taksim is excellent and in a good location away from some of the main tourist traps”
Reviews.Author: Pjorange
Reviews.Content: Generally the Faros Hotel in Taksim (there are two other Faros Hotels in Istanbul) is excellent. The only reason I have given it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the instructions to the hotel were not very clear. The address we were given was Taksim Caddesi, however this is a different street. The correct address is Taksim Dolapdere Caddesi which is not too far from Taksim Caddesi. Needless to say we had trouble finding the hotel, especially since it was pouring down with rain. However once we got to the hotel, everything was good. I would have liked to have seen some signage on the main road to the hotel. The hotel also has good transport links (fenicular/metro to Taksim Square or the old tram which runs along Istiklal Caddesi). Faros Hotel in Taksim is simply excellent. The rooms are very tastefully decorated, clean and modern. Our room had access to a little balcony and a small alcove with a desk and kettle. Generally it was a very comfortable stay. The breakfast, which was included in our stay, was very good. There is a little bit for everyone, from cereal, yoghurt, fresh fruits, Turkish pastries to cheese, cold cuts, and eggs. Tea and black coffee is free, however there is a small charge for cappucinos etc. The prices are very reasonable. Wifi is also available free of charge. It was raining while we were there and we were glad to be able to have a hot cup of Turkish tea when we came back in from the rain. The lobby is a nice space to have a drink or tea. The front desk was very helpful in providing all visitors with relevant tourist information. Although there is no restaurant in the hotel, there are two restaurants owned by the Faros Group not too far away. We tried 'Faros Kebab' on the first night and it was the best kebab we had during our stay. There are numerous other restaurants along this pedestrianised area which is a stone's throw away from the hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel. However I must say that I was rather disappointed with the Faros Hotel and Restaurant in Sirkeci (the Old Town). They overcharged us and the food was extremely inferior to the Faros Kebab in Taksim. I was very disappointed that the standards were not the same at all Faros hotels/restaurants. Other than that, I can not fault Faros Taksim. We are looking forward to going back.

Reviews.Title: “Faros Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Muhannad A
Reviews.Content: Few days ago I was @ Turkey , Istanbul Faros Hotel is a new hotel at Istanbul, Turkey it is in very nice street and quite location where you can feel safely and Relax . it is very nice , quit and modern place which allow you to have good room with perfect conditions , excellent services and suggest you good Trips and services . there is very good customer service , help and support special from Mr. Hasan he has very good customer service , business communication skills , he is helpful man . i suggest you to book at Al Faros Hotel for all your trips to istanbul . tel : +90 212 256 00 44 Muhannad Abo Ismael (mohaned1st@gmail.com) KSA

Reviews.Title: “city trip”
Reviews.Author: annemieke g
Reviews.Content: Review Hotel Faros Istanbul: We have stayed in Faros Hotel for 3 nights in March 2012. The hotel is situated in the district Taksim in Istanbul. Faros hotel is situated nearby the metro and bus. It is a hotel with very friendly staff, it has a small lobby with magazines and where you can order your drink. The rooms a very nice, clean and the toilet and shower are separated from the wash-stand. The staff brought our luggage to the rooms. When we were arrived, the hotel manager Hasan made us a cordially welcome. After we checked in, he offered us a drink and sat down with us and told all about the interesting points of Istanbul. He also gave some brochures. All the days we have stayed in Farros hotel, the staff was very friendly and gave us all the information we have asked for. We received great services! I also would like to mention something special. When our holiday was past, we had arranged a shuttle bus for taking us to the airport. Because there was a lot of traffic in Istanbul the driver called Farros hotel and asked if we could walk to a certain place nearby. The hotel manager Hasan told him that this was not in accordance with our agreement and told the driver to come to Farros hotel. He even told him to put our suitcases in the bus. When we arrived at the airport the chauffer was in a hurry, gave us our suitcases and left with my coat still in his bus. Because I didnâ€™t have his mobile number, I called to Farros Hotel and told the manager Hasan about my problem. He immediately called the company and 15 minutes later he told me that I could pick up my coat at the arrival hall at the airport. I really want to thank the manager for this effort! We can recommend Farros hotel for a special stay in Istanbul! The four Dutch ladies.

Reviews.Title: “faros taxim hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kondilia S
Reviews.Content: made my reservation via local travel agent in Grece first they booked 4 stars hotel which is in old ctiy Last minute they changed my hotel which is in taksim(Faros Hotel) they told me this is same standart when Ä± arrived hotel Ä± was so angry and Ä± saÄ±d Ä±mpossÄ±ble to stay such a that kÄ±nd small hotel Ä± called my travel agent and tell them that they chaet and lie me refund my all payment ! but when Ä± went Inside I suprÄ±sed hotel decoration is so difrent whic is skandivain style Ä± love and Ä±mportatn point is The gentlementwho welcome nicely and give so positive energy and he try to me calm down and enjoy my staying He is name is HASAN who is working for reception excellent services from the entire I lÄ±ke way of he treat us ! ! than hasan give so useful tips about ctiy ! he jsut made our program what to do in 3 days . 3 full great dayss Thank u hasan .. I feel free to recomended that forr who will visit istanbul try to ask room which is back side and higer floor..

Reviews.Title: “Just the perfect hotel for a vacation..!”
Reviews.Author: Menia B
Reviews.Content: It was a great hotel to stay during your holidays...The building, the rooms and the location of the hotel were really good.The personnel was very helpful and kind and especially our welcome host Hasan..I would really recommend this hotel to everybody who wants to visit Instabul as it is located very close to Taksim Sq. and there are lots of things to do around during the day and it is pretty close to all the touristic monu ents...In my next visit to Instabul I will definitely stay @Faros Hotel Taksim.... <3

Reviews.Title: “Comfortably Modern & Cozy. Simply Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: NadineNader
Reviews.Content: Very helpful and nice personnel, we used to tell them where we planned to go everyday and they would give us all the info we needed, bus stations, bus numbers,directions & maps.. They would even recommend restaurants & sights.. We needed that as most Turkish people don't know a word of english! I stayed there with my sister for a week & the 3 receptionists we met were all great. It's a small hotel, but had all we needed; it is clean and cozy. Excellent location; about 2 minutes walk to Taksim square. As a vegetarian I thought breakfast was good. Unfortunately there wasn't a good view from our window, yet it wasn't terrible! Highly recommended, I hope we can visit Turkey again and no doubt we'll stay at Faros.

Reviews.Title: “Sadie & Nes”
Reviews.Author: SadieH321
Reviews.Content: very comfortable hotel, the personnel is very kind Elif hanim and Mert bey helped us in all we needed. Hotel makes you feel at home, Everything in the Hotel is perfect. coming back Faros hotel in april, love from London Cyprus

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Alenka10
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable hotel, the personnel is very kind and professional. Hasan Yavuz on the reception helped us in all we needed. Hotel makes you feel at home with it's smiling face& friendly personnel , high quality service and very comfortable rooms. Everything in the Hotel is perfect. We would definitely consider coming back to Faros hotel the next time we go to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “excellently!”
Reviews.Author: Irina E
Reviews.Content: We visited this hotel 2 weeks ago. Good location, comfortable and clear rooms, excelent family room, very helpful staff. Thank a lot from all our teem to Umit for his very friendly and professionaly approach. We recommended this hotel with pleasure for all people!

Reviews.Title: “Faros”
Reviews.Author: mturanli
Reviews.Content: Rooms are quite and clean. Staf is very helpful. When you need any information they can give you useful ideas. Room price is acceptable. Lobby has a modern and chick concept. Breakfast is good and everything is fresh. The waiter Mr. Cengiz is very helpful. All staff is smiling and it is real smiles also it is very impressive. I stayed in a standart double room and spent 2 days in Faros Taksim. That 2 days were one of my best hotel experience.

Reviews.Title: “It is very nice and cute hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ozgur G
Reviews.Content: It is a new hotel with their excellent service. The staff is very helpfull. Guest relations manager Miss Gizem had recommend us fantastic places. Rooms are clean, especially Turkish bath style bathroom is excellent. You can have fresh home made bakery and juice choices on the breakfast. It is very nice and cute hotel with excellent service.

Reviews.Title: “Best quality/price hotel”
Reviews.Author: Drpatta
Reviews.Content: Excellent service and position. Nice rooms and very clean. The breakfast is very good. No noise . One of the few defects is that they do not clean the rooms in the afternoon and the room service is poor. But everybody who works there is really , really kind. The try to help you in all the possible ways. Will come back here soon.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Abir S
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt, the best possible place to stay! The warmest thanks to Elif, Mert, Ã‡aÄŸlar and the entire staff of Faros Taksim for their wonderful accommodation. As tourists they have kindly offered their help all throughout our stay and have truly made it an unforgettable trip and experience! The hotel itself is located in the midst of Taksim; a two minute walk to the Metro station, Taksim Square and Istiklal avenue. Their breakfast buffet was also great; a lot of variety and very fresh. The rooms and the entire Hotel is very modern yet extremely comfortable; we had no trouble adapting. We would recommend them at any time. Amazing staff and lovely hotel. Thank you all once again, The Honeymooners :)

Reviews.Title: “comfortable hotel with excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: LeslieMTL
Reviews.Content: This quite new hotel (a refit of a previous one, I understand) is very close to Taksim Square and public transportation available from Taksim metro station. My room was quite small, but the bathroom was excellent. The lights beside the bed were not really adequate for reading, and the one above the small table was the same. I had a room on the back, which was very quiet (a room on the street side could be noisy). The staff at this hotel are top notch -- really very helpful. I have had better breakfasts in mid-range hotels, but there was sufficient choice of fresh rolls, cereal, yogurt, cheese and fruit (the latter could be improved).

Reviews.Title: “well priced and located but uncomfortably modern”
Reviews.Author: nottyandnice
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for 4 nights. Breakfast was a tad dissapointing specially after having stayed in other hotels in istanbul before getting here. Service was extraordianry and they couldnt do enough to make me more comfortable. Bar staff was amazing specially Umit, he is the sweetest man. Rooms a lil uncomfy but bathrooms are nice with power showers , well appreciated after a tiring day. Also liked the fact that they dint make a fuss about visitors to yr room as some other hotels generally do. Will gladly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Dont ever book this hotel! They are thieves!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Alma R
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel over booking.com for the stay from 18th until 22nd of November. The price of stay for these five days was 321,00â‚¬ but when I checked my credit card statement I was shocked to see that Hotel Faros charged me double amount - so they charged me 650,00â‚¬. I called them to try to solve this issue but until now I DID NOT RECEIVE MY MONEY BACK. Every time I call them they tell me that the money that was overcharged is paid to my credit card number but they are lying because in one month period I did not receive my money back. I will surely not stop trying to get my money back but with this review I would like to inform everybody who is even thinking of staying in this hotel not to do it because they are lying thieves!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience”
Reviews.Author: chr04
Reviews.Content: The hotel is new. It's just 300m from Taksim square. Although the road infront of it has traffic, you can't hear anything inside the room. The personel is really good, and they did everything to answer or questions. The decoration is very modern. The beds are really nice, they even have two different pillows to suit your needs. The breakfast was nice, variety of food and juices. Imagine, they even had 6 different kinds of olives to choose!!! Highly recommented!

Reviews.Title: “Five stars”
Reviews.Author: Sertachio
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel in a very good location, in the middle of the city, very friendly and professional hotel employees. Clean and well equipped rooms. I would recommend this hotel if you are interested in a comfortable city hotel.
